short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily manage and monitor your AWS EC2 instances from one place.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AWS EC2s is a powerful and easy-to-use extension that allows you to manage and monitor your AWS EC2 instances from a single place. 

With AWS EC2s, you can easily view the status, type, and name of your instances, as well as perform actions such as start, stop, and terminate. 

As it also has a live refresh render that ensures that the status of your instances is always up to date. 

Your data security is paramount to us. Please note that our extension does not store your credentials or selections; all data are securely managed through your Google Chrome account. Our extension operates without an external database, relying on Google Chrome's robust security measures. Stay vigilant and contact us with any security concerns.
